            |operatorfabric.keycloak.realm||no|The realm name in keycloak server settings page
          
          
            
            |operatorfabric.keycloak.realm||yes|The realm name in keycloak server settings page. This is used for the log out process to know which realm should be affected.
          
      
    
    
  

This property is mandatory because log out won't work properly if it is absent.
